resources.string: Follow the map\nand visit the markers
When you reach one of these markers, \nlook at your phone for instructions
Keep the headphones on \nunless you are in danger
Take pictures whenever you want\nwe will send them to you later
Need some help?\nPress SOS to call us
Want to see this again?\nPress the info key.
When the others are ready\nlet\'s get going
Explore the frame together \nthrough the phone
If it is too dark\n turn on the light
